measured_by: Optimal performance on novel post-switch trials
justification: “We found that most of our participants selected the optimal path on novel post-switch trials… an observation which we refer to as zero-shot learning.”

measured_by: Spatial navigation task with sub-goal/goal switch
justification: The spatial version required participants to ‘find a key (sub-goal)… then a chest (goal)… Participants immediately generalised the new association, evidencing zero-shot learning.”

measured_by: Procedural cube-rotation task with sub-goal/goal switch
justification: In the procedural version, subjects ‘moved a rod to a specific cube-face (sub-goal)… which would then unlock reward at another cube-face (goal)’, and immediate generalisation after a switch demonstrated zero-shot learning.
